lines.text:
[On why a rape story is bogus]
... Wasn't his day- the poor guy didn't even get his pecker out!
Perverts and sluts! They are doing everything they can to take him away from us.

[On why she's keeping her nephew away from school]
You don't want to go back... you've learnt enough- besides, it's full of perverts!"
College is for rich kids and people with brains- you wouldn't fit in
You owe me!... You are staying and that's that!

[after Cheryl has just talked to Julie's mother on the phone]
I thought you told Billy Julie had been here.

[annoyed]
Do you always listen to other people's phone conversations?

[referring to Cheryl]
Why don't you stop tormenting her?
You talking to me, lady?
Yes.
Don't!
Now, Miss Roberts, you married?
No.
Divorced?
No.
Widowed?
No.
But you do have boyfriends?
No.
Do you like girls?
God, you're a pig!
I took a look at this fellow Brody. Seems he was fairly athletic. Why didn't he pin you down on the couch?
He tried, but I got away.
Now you said he touched your boob. How?
I refuse... to answer anymore of your questions.
Lady, I don't give a shit what you do.

[after Billy has just told his story of the rape]
That's good. That's very good, Billy. That's exactly word for word what you told me before. Did she help you memorize all that? Huh?
You stupid bully! He's telling the truth! Why you doing this to us?
Because there's a dead man in there. And I wanna know why he died.
I killed him! He tried to rape me!

[to the cops]
Lock her up.
Fuck you!
And fuck you!

[after he has just told Billy his story of Brody's murder]
Ain't that right, ma'am?
YOU FILTHY PIG! You think you got it all figured out, don't ya? Well you're wrong!
Phil Brody, remember him? The man who got wasted here? Well he was a fag, and it doesn't make a whole lot of sense for a fag to be raping your aunt, unless you're one. Are you a fag?
No!
I'm gonna ask you again, and keep in mind it pisses me off when people lie to me. Are you a fag?
You're crazy!
Next time... keep your queer hands off of me, okay?
Doesn't it bother you that he's a fag? Are you a fag?
Phil Brody, remember him? The man who got wasted here? Well he was a fag, and it doesn't make a whole lot of sense for a fag to be raping your aunt, unless you're one. Are you a fag?
I'm gonna ask you again, and keep in mind it pisses me off when people lie to me. Are you a fag?
Meatloaf, beatloaf.
